changelog.metadescription: KoolAutoComplete is excellent PHP Ajax AutoComplete. Flexible rendering, elegant behavior together with Ajax Load On-Demand have made KoolAutoComplete the great choice to replace limited auto-complete provided by browsers.
changelog.metakeywords: php ajax autocomplete, php autocomplete, php ajax autosuggest, php autosuggest
changelog.log: - Fix client-side conflict with MooTools framework.
- Enhance the option list management at client-side
- Enhance auto complete when working with different encoding.
- Make KoolAutoComplete work better with other language.
- Enhance the header and footer template.
- New property added: scriptFolder for manually setting the path to script folder.
- Add item common template to ease skin development
- First version of KoolAutoComplete has been released
